price: 103. Hadday rumeeyaanna (Xaqa) oo iska jiraan (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale), abaalgudka Alle baa u khayr badan, hadday ogaan lahaayeen.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَمَثُوبَةٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞۚ لَّوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaw annahum āmanū wa-ittaqaw lamathūbatun min ʿindi al-lahi khayrun law kānū yaʿlamūna
